headline: Marathon Petroleum Corp. Announces Quarterly Dividend
summary: FINDLAY, Ohio - The board of directors of Marathon Petroleum Corp. has declared a dividend of $0.91 per share on common stock. The dividend is payable March 10, 2025, to shareholders of record as of...
